mapper.select: SELECT * FROM budget_info WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND book_id = #{bookId} LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO budget_info ( user_id, book_id, total, category_budgets, period_start_day, annual_total, annual_category_budgets, update_time, created_at ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{bookId}, #{total}, #{categoryBudgets}, #{periodStartDay}, #{annualTotal}, #{annualCategoryBudgets}, NOW(), NOW() ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE total = VALUES(total), category_budgets = VALUES(category_budgets), period_start_day = VALUES(period_start_day), annual_total = VALUES(annual_total), annual_category_budgets = VALUES(annual_category_budgets), update_time = NOW()
